actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Commissioner of the District of Columbia to maintain a motorcycle unit within the Metropolitan Police force.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Commissioner of the District of Columbia to maintain a motorcycle unit within the Metropolitan Police force, and provides for the compensation of the members of such motorcycle unit.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Commissioner of the District of Columbia to maintain a motorcycle unit within the Metropolitan Police force.
